commit message: Add DigialClock widget with TimeZone support.
Update clock immediately after setting the time zone.
Fix padding and color in widget.
Adding multiple time zones at once.
Display clocks in widget and update it properly.
Hours in 24 hour mode are from 0 to 23.
Rename Eclipse project and add ant build script.
Fix selection background on pre Honeycomb devices.
Fix search view on pre Honeycomb devices.
